title: AI-Powered Dental Assistant
description: An intelligent full-stack SaaS application designed to revolutionize dental care through AI. The app provides instant AI-driven dental advice, allows users to book smart appointments, and delivers personalized care recommendations. Built with Next.js, Prisma, and Postgres for a robust backend, integrated with Clerk for authentication and payments, and enhanced with AI voice and text interaction powered by Vapi. Resend handles automated communication, while a clean Shadcn + Tailwind UI ensures a seamless, modern user experience.

title: üìù Full-Stack Google Docs Clone
description: I developed a full-featured Google Docs clone that enables teams and individuals to collaborate in real-time on documents. With a powerful text editor, collaboration features, and modern UI/UX, this project demonstrates advanced full-stack development skills, including real-time data syncing, authentication, and custom editor extensions.

title: Slack clone
description: I built a fully functional full-stack Slack clone with modern technologies and a focus on scalability, collaboration, and real-time features. The app replicates the Slack experience with real-time messaging, workspace management, threads, reactions, and media sharing ‚Äî making it a powerful team collaboration tool.

title: MacBook 3D Landing
description: A high-performance 3D MacBook landing page featuring smooth GSAP-powered scroll and entrance animations, built with React, Vite, and React Three Fiber. It showcases an interactive MacBook model (Three.js + drei), responsive layout, and optimized rendering with lazy-loaded assets and state managed via Zustand.
